name: 賀一平
objective: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
1  Cause and Effect                10 Editing 
2  Classification                  11 Editing and Revising
3  Enumeration                     12 Structure of the Research Paper
4  Comparison and Contrast         13 How to Write the Abstract
5  Process                         14 How to Write the Introduction
6  Definition                      15  How to Write the Method Section
7  Definition                      16  How to Write the Discussion
8  Structure of Technical English  17  Review and Final Exam
9  Mid-term                        18  Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Participation: 30%
Mid-term Exam: 30%
Final Exam: 40%
materials:
Day, R. A., & Gastel, B. (2006). How to write and publish a scientific paper.
Gustavil, B. (2003). How to write and illustrate a scientific paper.
Lannon, J. M. (1997). Technical writing.  
Weissberg, R., & Buker, S. (1990). Writing up research: Experimental research report writing for students of English.
